headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Mastercard (MA) Launching Blockchain Credential Integration With Polygon Labs
summary: In November 2025, Mercuryo announced a partnership with Polygon Labs and Mastercard to expand Mastercard Crypto Credential, now enabling simplified blockchain transactions with self-custody wallets and enhanced on-chain user verification. This collaboration marks the first time a native blockchain network fully supports Mastercard's credential system, highlighting a push for interoperability and improved security in digital payments globally. We'll explore how Mastercard’s advancements in...
